website_summaries.verdict: A flattering plus-size jean that feels and looks great on the body.
cons: A few buyers note fit discrepancies within the same size

customer_reviews.title: Oh, Levi. The love/hate continues
customer_reviews.text: I returned the 711 Skinny. I am 5'4", weigh 124 pounds and I purchased size 28. The legs were crazy skinny. I'm not a toothpick. I knew a larger size was still not going to fit. Levi's fit either perfectly or way off the mark. Absolutely no consistency in size. The pants I absolutely love are the 811 Curvy Skinny in a 29. I also like the Mid Rise Skinny in a 28. The 711 is definitely not for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: NinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pair of jeans
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pair of jeans. Size 28 fit like a glove on the parameters: hips 38 inches, waist 30 inches, inseam 30. Gorgeous color and classic orange stitching. And most importantly - nothing more. Again - this is the perfect everyday jeans, just going to order this model in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Arina Krapivina

customer_reviews.title: Good jeans, stretch out a bit quickly, sizing not consistent.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1 160lbs and ordered a 31 and a 30 - the 30 fit best. These are a little short on me, but my inseam is probably 34/35". I really like these jeans but they do stretch out quickly. However, with a higher rise they do not fall down like other jeans when they stretch out. One note - sizing and fit do not seem consistent. I had purchased the same jeans from Macy's (for $15 more) and returned them after ordering these, however they did fit slightly differently, even though they were exactly the same jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Buying pants is such a hideous task especially when you are a bit bigger of a girl. The back pant pockets are the main factor when I shop. Usually the bigger size you go the wider the back pockets are making your booty look far worse than you would ever imagine on yourself. BUT NOT THESE PANTS!! I got a size 33 (16 in normal sizing) and the back pockets are spaced quite flatteringly! The overall fit is great as well! The amount of stretch in these jeans is just right- keeping the jean look exactly that: jeans. I want more! Waiting to see more options than just this one in the size 33 y’all! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Fit and style are great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally a 27 depending on the style and brand. I took a chance based off the reviews and ordered a 27, it was kinda loose when i got them. However, one I washed them (cold water) and thew them in the dryer (on cold as well) and they now fit perfectly. I purchased these through the amazon deals page for about 30% off and am happy I did. I will definitely be looking to buy more, it's hard to find a good fitting skinny jean. FYI these are more jean feeling material than a legging feel for those who were wondering. I also have skinnier calves and these hug them nicely with a little give, but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Jeans came worn!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review based on how shocked I am. Today, I received one of MANY Levi’s jeans ordered here on Amazon. As I began opening the package I noticed the jeans came with no tags, pockets out and the pants unbuttoned. They looked as if they have been worn and washed. I am VERY disappointed and grossed out by this. Amazon, I expected more than this. Major let down!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously too small
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are insanely small for the size. Like, two sizes too small. I purchased another pair of Levi’s (different style) at the same time, and went up a size per recommendation; those jeans are a bit too large. Would be great if Levi’s could get their fit consistent.
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying these in more colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! The waistband is nice and thick, so it won't bunch up and roll over when you sit down. I usually get my pants from Target, so I ordered one size up from my usual size and it was a perfect fit (usually an 18 at Target, ordered a 20). The only thing is the legs are a bit baggy. But I have pretty small legs for my waist size, so I usually expect that from "skinny" jeans lol. I can tell this fabric will last a while, too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect what a seal for a good pair of jeans
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Levi's in was deal of the day $29.99! Fits perfect what a seal for a good pair of jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Alsua Family

customer_reviews.title: jegging fit, jean quality
customer_reviews.text: Any time I come back for more of something, I try to leave a review. That's definitely the case here! These jeans are comfortable and stretchy and hug with a "jegging" type fit, but have functioning pockets, buttons, zippers, and the reliability of quality jeans. The material on the pair I got is so soft that I don't need dryer sheets to make them feel soft and comfortable, which is great because I don't like to risk the fit of my jeans by throwing them in the dryer. Putting them on for the first time they were *slightly* snug, but relaxed with some wear and have maintained the perfect shape through washing, hang-drying and wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Lid

customer_reviews.title: Check The Hem Finish, Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these jeans ( am 5'2", 107# and wear a size 2). Perfect amount of stretch, no waist gap. This is my 2nd pair, but unfortunately returning this order because (1.) I didn't realize they aren't hemmed, just raw cut and (2) I thought they'd be more denim-like instead of dyed blue. Am returning and reordering though.
customer_reviews.author: Fatchihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Probably great if you're not built like I am
customer_reviews.text: This is a "me" problem, but if you're shaped like me, this might help. I have slender and muscular legs. I also have no butt. I wear a size 31 (aka 12) and carry all my weight out front (stomach, boobs). So. The waist fits FINE. The length is FINE. These are, at first, quite cute BUT the legs are not skinny enough for me, and I get saggy diaper-looking butt after a day of wearing these. They stretch out amd dont go back until they're washed and dried again. I need to go back to super stretchy denim so stuff will conform better to my lack of butt but also stomach that isnt ready for a smaller size pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Decent rips, super soft
customer_reviews.text: I anxiously awaited these, received them today, they did not disappoint. My waist is 33 but the size 29 fit(8M W29 L30), I'm 4' 11 ". My grandma says I have long legs for my little height, she might be right because these weren't short and they fit at my ankles, they pooled a little but short jeans fit exactly at my ankles, no pooling.
customer_reviews.author: Tahanie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Recommend you buy them TWO sizes larger than your regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is crazy for these Levi's. Recommend you buy them TWO sizes larger than your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cut, but a bit too large
customer_reviews.text: These didn't come in petite sizes, so I knew I'd have to have them hemmed up a bit, which is typical for me. I'm 5'-4" and I usually have full length pants taken up while petite sizes can be too short. What surprised me is that I have other jeans that are size 32 and they are tight in the waist. I got a 33 in these thinking they would be perfect, but they are just a little larger than expected and not the ideal fit. I'd order a size, maybe two smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Spentpoets

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans in Hella Shady
customer_reviews.text: The Hella Shady wash is 98% cotton/ 2% elastine - which is what I have been looking for - the heftier, traditional denim fabric, not this polyester "stretch" stuff. I also like that these jeans actually reach the ankle. (Why are all the jeans out there a 7/8th length these days? I don't want to show my ankle in cold weather..stop that. ) Excellent fit and wash for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: As always Levi’s goes hard in the quality game. Super surprised to find a pair that actually KINDA goes down to my ankles (I’m 5’7” with extra wide hips) and also fit around my waist no problem. Not much jumping around/tugging/pulling/crying while trying to get them on. Stretchy waistband makes my life so much easier. Haven’t worn it too much to give a full quality review, so I don’t know how long these are gonna last before that dreaded hole shows up between my thighs. But my hopes/expectations are high.
customer_reviews.author: Karinna

customer_reviews.title: Sad day
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these jeans. Levi tends to run small on me so I ordered up a size. I could not get these over my calves let alone my thighs and booty. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: Love these pants!
customer_reviews.text: I buy the 711 jeans in every style that I can. They fit me like a glove. I'm apple shaped, so I have almost no hips or butt and I have a larger waist. I love these jeans. They make me look like I have a good shape and they don't stretch out so much that I can't wear them past a few hours. They are comfortable and they don't pinch. I wasn't able to get the short ones, so the black ones that I got are a little long, but it's not something that I've haven't had to deal with before. Cute pants!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee D.

customer_reviews.title: They're made with Lycra and are like leggings. So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Never taking these off! They're made with Lycra and are like leggings. So comfortable!!! I have the worst ti,e with jeans because I have hips, thighs and butt, and these are perfect. I'm 5'6", 138lbs, normally a size 4 or 6 depending on the brand, but am a pretty consistent size 28 in Levi's and these were no exception. About an inch too long but that's no biggie for me.
customer_reviews.author: kristin o

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy in all the right places
customer_reviews.text: Great color and cut and stretchy comfort. I wish the waistband was at least a half-inch looser, but the rest of the fit is perfect. I chose “fit as expected” because of the overall fit, which is quite stretchy. I have another pair in the same size and similar style (not 711, but skinny midrise plus) and they are perfect (so of course they are no longer available). These don’t meet that pair’s standard, but they are very close and the price today ($35) is reasonable for them. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wash/color jean.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute perfect color/wash jean. Also, the perfect length. I have more of a "slim" cut body instead of a curvy body... meaning my waist and hips are nearly the same size. I'm 5'3" and weigh about 130 lbs. I think I got a size 4...I cut out the tags. These are allllmost perfect they just hit a little hard at the waist causing a bit of muffin top...which, if I had a perfectly sculpted body wouldn't be a problem...but I don't...so it's something to keep in mind. They stretch out perfectly after a few hours though👌
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good for thin people that need specific waist sizes
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t your typical high rise and have that classic Levi’s fit. Stretchy yet still keep their tight fit as the day wears on. I don’t feel like I have to hike up my pants ever. I’m 5 foot 6, 115 pounds and got the 24. Fit like a glove! I recommend these for thin people who have a hard time finding jeans that fit right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First off I love Levi Jeans they always give me the fit I ...
customer_reviews.text: These were everything I hoped for, First off I love Levi Jeans they always give me the fit I need. Had been looking for some ripped jeans for a while. But most of the ones I found were just ripped to much to be worth the investment . These had a big rip in one knee and a few smaller ones.So I know these will not rip to shreds over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering jeans online. I've gained weight since I last bought any. I've never bought any that didn't have sizes like 4, 6, 8...20. I asked the seller for advice on what size to order. I am 5'3 and weigh 152. I carry too much weight around the belly. These jeans (31 average) fit me perfectly. I was sure I'd be sending them back. They are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” tall and weigh 122 lbs. In other 711’s I’ve worn a size 27 with a 32” inseam. These were long enough, but pretty tight. I ended up ordering a size 29 with a 34” inseam directly from Levi (because amazon doesn’t carry them). They’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: They're jeans, but so far from fitting or flattering
customer_reviews.text: I think the title says it all. They are very thin & stretchy, so sizing is very difficult & inseam length seems off since these were much longer than any other pant w/ same inseam length. But even if they fit properly throughout, I still foresee bunching at knee & loose around lower belly/bikini area & lower bum. I don't think they're sturdy enough to hold their shape after a few hours of wear, so not flattering or slimming or hugging anywhere. Of course, of the 3 pairs of Levi's I ordered from Amazon around the same days, 1 pair was literally 10 sizes too big. That's on Amazon, not the jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have searched and purchased and purchased jeans looking for that good fitting skinny jean. I've paid $$ (think Paige, Lucky, NYDJ etc.) and these are perfect and resist stretch-out in the bum. I no longer have a young woman's body (past 65) so my waist is thicker then it used to be when I could get a nice tight fit on the bottom because I was fitting my waist. Nope - now it's fit the waist and too loose in the butt and legs. These work, nice fit and skinny ! You might have to try a couple as I've found Levi's are not universally the same fit but it was worth my patience.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: Nice jeans but run small.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4", 153 lbs, rounded hips but small lower leg and ankle. I have had a hard time finding gray jeans, which is my preference. Looked through several department stores and finally went to Amazon. I ordered four brands, the same day: This brand: Levi's Women's 711 Skinny Jeans, Dark Matters, 30 (US 10) R, and Amazon Brand - Daily Ritual Women's Mid-Rise Skinny Jean, Hi-Lo Grey, 30 (10) Regular. Both were too small in the waist and through the hips. Glad I had two more brands to try on!!! Democracy Women's Ab Solution Jegging, Dark Grey, 12 fit great and the LEE Women's Slimming Fit Rebound Skinny Leg Jean size 12 fit perfectly. YEA!!
customer_reviews.author: EJD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6'' and 135lbs. I've realized my body just loves these Levi's Skinny Jeans. I go for 27 R and it fits great. They allow me to stretch and move but stay fit wise well. No stretching noted with the first few months noted on these. I have noted some stretching in their cheaper (strauss?) brand in the past. These originals I haven't noted that. The "boombox" is a fun speckle look I got a bunch of comments on. I bought the black recently as well. I plan to gradually gather multiples from this levi brand and style!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this pair of jeans. I received it today and I am happy with the purchase. I am 5'4" and 165 to 170 lbs and I ordered the Holiday Fun size 32 Regular . The colour is so beautiful and it fits great, the material is really nice too. I think I could have gotten away with a size 31 which is a size 12 Medium. to get a snugger fit, so I ordered 4 more pairs in different colours including this colour again lol. UPDATE: l bought the other colours in size 31 including the Holiday fun and they fit even better! I have decided to give the size 32 to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: I love me some Levi 711 💗
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the Levi style I have always loved!!! This fit is by far the most perfect, sexy, comfy, fit for my body type (short torso, not small waisted, long legs). And I sold my other pair without writing down which ones they were. Since then I have gone thru several pair that I didn't really care for. I found myself hardly wearing any Levi's, and picking out off brand jeans that don't last. I AM DONE LOOKING 😉 I need a pair of this style in every color please 👌
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I have the gray ones, which fit well, and I ordered the same size in white. They were HUGE around the hips. I don’t get it. I suspect they aren’t real Levi’s if the sizes vary so drastically. The material is not that different. The gray ones are 99% cotton and the white ones are 97% cotton. I also own like 6 other pairs of Levi jeans purchased directly from Levi’s which all fit in the same size. Wish they fit because they’re cute other than being huge around the hips. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: sl

customer_reviews.title: Happy about it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these jeans, they’re really comfy! I ordered the 33(16) and for reference I’m 5’6” and approx. 200lbs. I have only worn these jeans once so I do need to break them in a little (I found myself pulling them up in the back a bit- big butt lol). All in all I look forward to wearing these more often
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Measure yourself !
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants! I got them in 2 other colors both the others are jean color rather than black. They all have some stretch. I just read the size chart and measured myself with tape. I got size 14 weigh 179lbs and I’m 5’10. I wrote the jeans are above my ankle because I am taller and had to get these in regular as they did not have my size (32) in tall. So happy to have these quality jeans that actually fit me and hug in the right places !
customer_reviews.author: MutterThings

customer_reviews.title: The Jean Solution for Baggy Knee Phobia
customer_reviews.text: I dislike skinny jeans that get baggy knees midway through the first day of wear after a wash. These held up with no baggy knees on a weekend trip through NYC so I recommend to anyone with similar baggy knee phobia. I ordered a 28R/6 and I'm 5'6" and weigh 129 and I'm all straightness. I imagine these would also work on a curvy girl because they have a lot of stretch.
customer_reviews.author: PDX mom

customer_reviews.title: don't hold their shape
customer_reviews.text: i loved these when I first put them on. Actually, they are pretty tight on my legs and calves, which isn't the most comfortable thing ever, but the top fit well. usually pants like that will give me a muffin top. What I hated about them, and which I could return them but I wore them already, is that the but stretched out SO much they turned into a horrible shapeless mess. So tight legs, no butt after an hour. I would get stretch ones next time. Would NOT recommend these
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Back for a second pair!
customer_reviews.text: Levi's have become my go-to jeans after I bought this pair and fell in love. The fabric is thicker and sturdier than any other pair of jeans I've owned. They fit me like a glove and they look amazing on me! They felt a little snug when I first tried them on but they quickly seemed to form to my body and then fit like I'd worn them for years the second time I put them on. I'm now back for a second pair. 😊
customer_reviews.author: mackdoozle

customer_reviews.title: The design wasn’t as shown but overall good jeans.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 40 (Size 20) stars design but it wasn’t the gold stars as shown in the photo. They are more gunmetal colored stars on the front calf. I liked enough I didn’t return the jeans. I own a pair of these jeans in size 22 but they are huge on me now. I ordered basically size 20 they are more fitted, kind in of a shocking way, that the legs are very fitted but the waist gaps a bit. I am hour glass shaped so it’s an issue with gapping at waist.
customer_reviews.author: B. Happy 1717

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! Favorite Jeans!
customer_reviews.text: In too superlow Levis I was a size 1. I got these in 25 (size 0) they fit like a dream! In the midrise (another listing) I need a 00. I am 5'2" 118 lbs and even though small very curvy!!! These are awesome! I didn't need to cut them. i got a short. They just meet my ankle. Anymore and I would of had to cut them.
customer_reviews.author: Stracey

customer_reviews.title: My perfect jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans! I'm 5'11" so being able to order them in tall sizes un fantastic. It's hard for me to find jeans that don't expose my whole ankle, which looks silly with most shoes. These jeans are looong, like I actually get the little bunch up by the ankle long. The pockets are well placed and a flattering size. My husband says they make my butt look good. I own these in several colors and have pretty much stopped buying any other jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Puglife

customer_reviews.title: Great fit at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have been in the habit of buying $150 designer jeans. However, I was on vacation and under packed so just need a pair quickly to get me through the week. Hopped on Amazon, read countless reviews, and I couldn’t be happier with these. I am 5’7” 115 lbs and would say my legs are longer than average. They fit perfectly, no stretching out over the day and have a nice, quality feel to them. I will buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: Granolamama

customer_reviews.title: Try multiple sizes
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, have I run the gamut in sizes. I returned Levi 535 skinny jeans that were 33. I decided to try a different style (these) and ordered 34 thinking they’d fit perfect. Wrong! These were too big! I’m normally a 33 in Levi’s. I decided after returning these aid go to Target. I found pair of Universal Threads that fit perfectly after trying on 3 different sizes. The moral of the story is, if you’re ordering from Amazon, maybe you need to order multiple sizes and not trust the size they used to be, even though you’re the same height and weight.
customer_reviews.author: KMM675

customer_reviews.title: Love Levi's ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Jeans are super cute. True to size (I'm 5'6, 165 lbs, size 11). They have a bit of a stretch to hug the right areas which is nice since Levi's usually have no give. Thinking about purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Low rise waist
customer_reviews.text: Generally, these jeans fit great and look good. They are true to size and are a true skinny, that is close to the leg. The fabric is of a decent thickness. However I did not keep them because I found that the waist was a bit lower rise than I prefer. But if you like a low rise waist, these would be great jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs (different colors, same size) of the Levi 711 skinny. One was too tight, one was too loose, and one fit just right. The thing is... the one that fits just right is SOOO right. I recommend (if you can) trying these on in store to get the color/fit that works for you. My new fav jeans. Sending other two back.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. Sits perfectly right at top of hip bones. I am 5'1, 100 lbs, 24 waist and 34 hips, athletic build. Ordered 25x30 and wouldn't go smaller
customer_reviews.author: Esther Doud

customer_reviews.title: Smell odd but cute jeans
customer_reviews.text: Update: these jeans lost the stretch after one was and are super tight!! I should have kept the size 31 and washed them. The smell is still bad. 1st review:These jeans are very cute. They fit perfect. I am 5’4 and weigh 170 and I got it in a size 30. The only complaint that I have is that they smell odd.. I’ve washed them and it did not come out.. hopefully as I continue to use and wash them the smell will eventually go away.
customer_reviews.author: ID123

customer_reviews.title: My Perfect Jean
customer_reviews.text: My perfect jean. I am 5'6" and have kindof short legs for my height, a big butt and a smaller waist. Normally, jeans that fit my butt are way too baggy in the legs and/or waist, or jeans that fit my waist and legs squish my butt flat :/. These have a great mid-rise that fits snugly but not too tight, and is a true skinny jean WITH room in the butt. Great amount of stretch, and the distressed washes (I have two different ones) are done well enough that I don't just end up ripping them more like some other styles I've gotten.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Best jeans I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans! I’m normally a size 18/20 depending on cut or brand, so I went with a 20 for these to be safe. Especially since they’re skinny cut. I have never purchased jeans online before, or buying jeans without trying them on first. I was thrilled when I received these to discover they fit perfectly, better than any jeans I’ve ever purchased before! I’ve worn them twice without washing and they’ve held their fit and shape wonderfully. They are a little long on me, but I’m only 5’2” so that’s not unusual, and with the skinny cut, I just scrunched them a bit at the bottom and they were just fine. These jeans are a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Langan

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans. Levi's have always been my favorite and I was thrilled to find these on here for a few bucks cheaper than in the store. They both look and feel really nice. They do have a little bit of a stretch which is nice for a girl with a round butt like me. I'm 4'11/110lbs/size US 6 and I ordered a size 28 short. They fit me perfectly and I will definitely be back to order more
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hill

customer_reviews.title: These are good jeans.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall fit and color. Nice dark denim that stretches in the right places and doesn't gap. The fit around the ankle is such that they actually look like jeans and not leggings. They are at my ankle so they are versitile with boots and flats. ( I'm 5'5") I don't like the way the fabric pulls on the outside seam, like they were cut against the grain. However , I'm willing to overlook this as other factors outweigh it.
customer_reviews.author: Jmeaney

customer_reviews.title: This hugs every curve and has enough stretch to look tight but feels like leggings
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair of Levi's and after this purchase I had to buy 3 extras. It's so comfortable I feel like I'm wearing leggings. We are in August and I do not over heat in them, they are breathable and comfortable. I'm in love. I can't wait to wear these with my uggs for the fall.
customer_reviews.author: justina

customer_reviews.title: NOT real Levi’s
customer_reviews.text: I exclusively wear Levi’s jeans I like the fit and they’re always in style these however are NOT real Levi’s and believe me I know I’m usually a size 24 and these after one night of wearing them to work stretched out so much I had to wash them just so they’d shrink Also they completely faded to an ugly gray color after the first wash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Not the Right Cut for Curvy Figures
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are definitely not for you if you have an hourglass figure. The waist was huge on me and the legs were super tight. I took a chance because I liked the look. The jeans were good quality material like I would expect from Levi's. I was disappointed they didn't work out for me. My rating is really just due to the fit, not product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jean search over! Winner
customer_reviews.text: My first Levi jeans... I’ve been loyal to American Eagle for years until I realized their sizing was wayyyyy off and not flattering for ladies with big booties. These hit at your true waist line, stretch and flatter the booty. I’m 5’7 140 for reference. Small waist and large butt. I’m usually a 4/6 in American Eagle but sized up to an 8 (29) for these. Fit like a glove, no muffin top and don’t dig into my sides. I ordered another pair after trying them on!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT skinny legged jeans, just tapered!
customer_reviews.text: Really wish clothing manufacturers would stop using the term "skinny" for all their ugly tapered leg jeans. There is a difference! These are not remotely skinny, just tapered as opposed to bootcut or flare legged, or bell bottoms, etc. They are awful if you are a female with legitimately SKINNY legs. These were gigantic in the thighs, calves and ankles. I am 5'6", 135lbs, leggy and the 30" was too short for me, 32" would have been the way to go but either way, these were ugly as sin. At their fullest, my calves are 12.5 to 13" in circumference and ankles about 8.25" just for reference. If you have long skinny legs, DO NOT bother with these.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Levi’s
customer_reviews.text: As a reference- I’m 5’4” /145 lbs. and ordered a size 28 (6). I really have no complaints about these jeans. They are authentic and made of good material. I also ordered the same pair in black and they fit the exact same way which is nice because more often than not a different pair of jeans in the same size won’t fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great for pear shapes.
customer_reviews.text: These pants fit great! I ordered one size up as recommended by other buyers. I would recommend the same. These are made for curvy pear shapes like me. The waste area is smaller than the area for the hips. They fit snug, not tight, along the hips, thighs and legs. No gap at the waste! No issues with the pants sliding down or risk of showing your undies in the back. They pretty much stay in place. The black is true black, not faded. Material has some some stretch to it and is relatively soft for denim. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice butt!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these right now and they’re my absolute favorite pair of 711s!!! Levi’s are my signature, the only jeans I’ll ever wear and I wear them until they literally fall apart. I will be buying these again since they are naturally falling apart lol.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order jeans online. I am 5’0 and about 130lbs. My hips are a little bit wider since having kids. It’s been a struggling finding jeans that fit both my waist and my length. I ordered size 30 short and they fit perfect. They are super comfy and have a good amount of stretch to them (which I love). I don’t like when jeans don’t have any stretch to them. They look great and I can tell they will last!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: soft black is very thin material
customer_reviews.text: SOFT BLACK in 27L : very thin material, different form another pair in the same color that I purchased from a different seller. The one from Amazon is 78% cotton ( not 66% as listed here;the other pair i have is 66% cotton and is thicker ) and the material is super thin, doesn't feel like denim at all. Soft Black in 27R: as advertised material, 66% cotton, still quit thin but stretchy
customer_reviews.author: Europe

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I love levis jeans and own many of them. I’m wearing them from my childhood and a big fan of them in terms of quality, fitting and durability. But this one has horrible quality. It’s so thin I could not believe its a $50 levis jeans. Its mostly looks live unnamed brand’s $20 cheap quality pants. The fitting is also very uncomfortable. Returning and I’m not going to buy jeans from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS like MOTH balls??!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love ordering levis from Amazon, but this is the second pair that has a moth-ball (chemical?) smell. I thought a few washes would do the trick, but NO, smells so gross I cannot wear. Tried all sorts of scent-removing- tricks and am now stuck w/the smelly un-wearable jeans since I took too long to return. Do not order these! Update: Thank you Amazon customer service for letting me return these smelly jeans
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Jeans
customer_reviews.text: Due to my original review being rejected I will try to say this as sugary as possible. These pants are just the bees knees, super duper. I did receive jeans, they did however not send me the pair that I ordered (Still Dreamin) I instead received "Indigo Ridge" (My LEAST favored pair), obviously they disagree with that statement. It is what it is, I ripped the tags off anyway, I don't have enough pants to be that picky.
customer_reviews.author: Maomi

customer_reviews.title: love these jeans!
customer_reviews.text: these jeans are the best i've bought in years! the denim is a nice weight while still having a little bit of stretch to them. they do not stretch out even after hours of wear which is what i was looking for - no saggy bottoms here! the legs are perfectly skinny so they look good when worn with boots. another feature i was looking for. for reference, i am 5'6", 172 lbs and carry my weight more in the belly area and have slimmer legs. the size 12/31 fit me like a glove while still being amazingly comfortable. i will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I only wear these now!!
customer_reviews.text: I had recently gained a little weight so I needed some new, stretchy jeans and YESS these are perfect! I wear them all the time. They are stretchy and the color is just a classic denim that goes with anything. They fit true to size (got a 29, i am 5'4", 145 pounds with a tummy pooch) and they are comfortable standing and sitting. Even though they are strechy, they do not stretch too much that they sag or anything. Would and probably will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted! The stretch in these jeans is amazing! I am 5'9, 145lbs. and I normally wear a size 4 pant. I purchased a size 4/27 in these and they fit exactly as I hoped they would. My inseam is 33" and these come right above my ankle. The released hem is so cute, and I really can't say enough good things about how comfortable these jeans are! If you're looking for a great skinny ankle and released hem jean, I HIGHLY recommend these! You'll love them! I've worn them 2 days in a row now, and the fit is still awesome because of the stretch. Seriously, BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Jilly Stras

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A jean I CAN wear!
customer_reviews.text: These jeans were exactly the fit I was looking for! I cannot wear a high rise or normal mid rise jean as my torso is too short. Luckily, through research, I learned that many of Levi's jeans are labeled "mid-rise" but the actual measurements of the rise are closer to a low rise (but not butt showing super low-rise). Out of all of the jeans I ordered to try, these particular 711 skinny jeans were perfect! I can't wait to build a collection of these! I recommend trying on any 711s you get because they can have slightly different fits!
customer_reviews.author: starzzzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice jeans
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7, 34dd and 170lbs. I bought a size 12. I’ve never bought Levi’s before, but I am happy with these. They’re not too short and they have a nice amount of stretch to them. I usually have a hard time finding jeans that accommodate my hip to waist ratio. These are a little big around the waist, but I haven’t actually worn them yet and other reviews say that after wearing them a few times they become more form fitting so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: My new fave jeans for curvy stocky bodies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the slightly distressed paper wash. I’ve worn them a half dozen times and I love love them! Super comfy skinnies, not too stiff but they don’t bag either. I’m a stocky short waisted curvy size 16 short, (5’6” but short inseam) and they fit just below my ankle. They are form fitting but still look like jeans, not leggings. Love them! Wi buy them in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: TSP

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these jeans and they have a distressed rip in the knee that was not in the description or on the website
customer_reviews.author: JUSTINE BERMUDEZ

customer_reviews.title: One Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4 and 133 lbs. I usually wear a size 4. I bought the 28 inch jeans based on reviews saying to go one size up if you don't want a really snug fit. My jeans fit perfect. Not too tight but snug enough to be shapely. I absolutely love the jeans. They are a little thinner than Levi's used to be but, for me, that is ok.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim during the Prime days and am so happy with my purchase. These jeans are soft from the first wear and the distressing is just enough to be chic and stylish. The thing I love most is the flattering fit. They do not sit low on the hips and risk giving me plumber crack. I have washed them several times already and they are holding their shape and not wearing out. There is give/stretch to the material which makes them so comfortable. I plan on buying a second pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Buy them from Macy’s.
customer_reviews.text: Hated them! Nothing like the genuine 711’s that I bought from Macy’s that are supposedly the exact same brand, style, and size.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Different washes = different sizing ?
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a little confused by this one...I have a pair of these already in my closet (size 8/29 Long) that I bought less than a year ago- light wash. They fit great, hence why I wanted another pair. I bought the same ones in a dark wash and they were noticeably smaller. Same brand, style, sizing etc... I'm going to assume this was just a mishap or a wide allowance in the pattern, but nevertheless I'll be returning them!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Decent black ripped jeans
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black ripped jeans. They showed up smelling like the usual mildew/chemical smell that most China goods have which makes me question if they’re authentic Levi’s. Since they do not come in a long inseam (32”), they are about 1-2 inches too short. I’m 5’5 with most of my height in my legs. I’m keeping them but will primarily wear them with boots since they’re cute but short. I’m hoping a few washes will take care of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love the Perfect Fit for a Less Curvy Build
customer_reviews.text: I love how these 711 Levi’s skinny jeans are stretchy and very fitted through the hips and legs because usually if I buy other style women’s skinny jeans with a 30” waist I have to take them in in the hip and leg as they are always too curvy and I have a more broad and short, more athletic build, as opposed to a curvy one. The medium waist means the rise is just right for me being that I’m only 5’ 1” and 125 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Basil

customer_reviews.title: Fav Go to Skinnies!
customer_reviews.text: I own Three pair all in different colors. Fav jeans hands down! I used to wear American Eagle (for years!) and since the fabric has changed there I switched to Levi’s! The fit is better, they don’t stretch or sag after an hour and I do not have to constantly pull them up! Love these! Also just for info. I take a size 29, with a 30 inseam. Even the Levi’s site suggests a size 30/32 but by my measurements I sized Down and they fit perfectly not too tight as I was afraid of! Also I’m 45, no junior shaped body here for reference lol
customer_reviews.author: henrietta

customer_reviews.title: Best Jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, soft, quality denim. The deconstruction looks cool and edgy, a bit like a peek a boo, where you don't really notice the slits till your legs bend while walking. (It's a fun and unique feature, I think). I absolutely love these jeans. They're so comfortable it feels like I'm wearing yoga pants. The shipping was very fast. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johnene

customer_reviews.title: Nice jeans but the sizing is confusing
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on and they were super loose in the waist. I was confused about the sizing and ordered a 33 short which turned out to be size 16 and I normally wear size 12. Oddly they were still fairly tight in the legs. These were the deal of the day so I will probably just keep and wash them a few times until hopefully the waist shrinks or I gain more weight :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Still on the hunt for perfect olive jeans, but these will suffice for now
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is not really a good denim, but extremely stretchy, so some camel toe might occur if you’re not careful. They’re pretty skin-tight all over, and kind of accentuate any saddle bags you might have. These are just the slightest bit too small, but until I find a better pair that fits, I’ll keep them. The color is like a dirty light olive, more brown/tan than green/army green, but goes well with some of my dark tan, not quite Cognac booties. They’re good enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: OK but not enough stretch
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep these jeans to wear on days around the house but they look like true "mom jeans" on. The back of the waist bags out and the cut through the hip isn't the most flattering. They're adequate just not as stylish as I'd hope.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Fit runs small but overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered a size 16 which is a size bigger than I usually wear and still the jeans are fairly tight. My other issue is that even after washing the jeans have stained my underwear. Overall though they are not too bad. I don't think I will buy anymore of this one though.
customer_reviews.author: Izzygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and flattering.
customer_reviews.text: These were better then expected-these are now my favorite fitting skinny jeans- only downside is I would say the material is a little thinner than I would normally like, but for the price worth it! They are true to size- I am 5 ft 3 weigh 110 and the size 26 fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and comes up higher in the back!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of these because I have a pair at home that are completely worn out and they fit so well I needed to get a few new pairs! The best part of these pants is they are mid-rise but the back of the jeans come up higher than the front, so the front is comfortable and I know I'm not going to be showing my butt if I bend down! Stretchy, great colors, very comfortable. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: True Black Denim
customer_reviews.text: Love this fit! I have them in black with distressing in the knee. I got these because I needed something without holes for work, and these are exactly what I wanted. They aren’t jegging material. They are true black denim with stretch which is exactly what I wanted. It’s hard to find black jeans for women that aren’t thin material or stretchy leggings with the pockets sewn shut. Trust me, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t worn a pair of Levi jeans in ages. I came across these and loved the distressing and wash. They were on sale so that for sure was a sign that I had to try them. I’m so glad I did! They are a great pair of jeans. I’m usually a size 27 (4) in most jeans. After reading the reviews I decided to size up one and I’m glad that I did. I got the size 28 (6) regular and they fit great. I am 5’7 and they are a great length too. @sarahlavender on Instagram for fashion finds & deals.
customer_reviews.author: SarahL

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these jeans! Perfect fit and great quality. I am 5’1 113lbs and I ordered a size 27 regular. They are a tad bit long on me but they look great rolled up as well. I love the quality of these jeans and I don’t need to worry about the knees tearing more, like I do with other jeans. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fake Levi’s unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I received the “R” tag counterfeit Levi’s. Kinda disappointed but they’re still decent quality and look good. Only payed $20 so they’re atleast worth that. Just really wish they were the real deal as advertised, not cool. Going to call and see why they’re selling fake Levi’s. Overall super cute, fit good. A little stretch. Mid rise. Look just like the picture. Had they been authentic Levi’s I’d have given 4-5 stars. Size 12 R arrived as 12 mediums. I’m 5’5” big hips, 180 pounds for reference. Tight in the legs, a little loose in the waist-gotta belt them. Hit right at the bottom of my ankle, top of foot.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can order Levi's and be very sure they'll fit. I ordered a larger size than usual, because I've gained a few pounds while quarantining and the jeans fit. It's amazing what happens when you order the appropriate size. In summary, the jeans fit nicely because I ordered the right size and they seem a little thicker than some skinny jeans' fabrics go.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a size 10 so that's what I got and it was so tight on me. I mean I could wear it and it'll probably loosen up over time but at first it was uncomfortable sitting in them. Other than that they're great pants.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rivenbark

customer_reviews.title: The jeans are nice looking, but the label is from China
customer_reviews.text: The jeans are nice looking, but the label is from China and the fit is off. inseam seems too restrictive and there is not enough stretch. still on the fence if I will be sending them back. I also hope that AMAZON would be more transparent as to where their items originate from. I try to purchase items from the US primarily because sizing is always way off when they come from oversees.
customer_reviews.author: Beezus11

customer_reviews.title: The legs fit great but the waist is huge
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are the weirdest fitting jeans I've ever owned. The legs fit great but the waist is huge. This is the second pair I ordered trying to find a good fit. The first pairs would of fit my waist but the legs were so small I couldn't fit my foot through. I'm wondering if amazon only gets the messed up Levi's. I have to keep this pair because I ripped the tags off like a dumba$$
customer_reviews.author: books:)

customer_reviews.title: Too skinny
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these jeans but I couldn't. Waist was good, just below the belly button, but the legs were way too tight for me. I am 5'2, 120 lbs. and have thin legs. Also the material was very stretchy and bagged around the knees. I have other skinny jeans in denim material that are just fine which leads me to think its the material that makes the difference.
customer_reviews.author: john d'angelo

customer_reviews.title: Front pockets are maybe an inch or two deep. Not functional
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe these are brand name Levi's Front pockets are maybe an inch or two deep. Not functional at all. Very disappointed but decided to keep them because I liked the color of the jeans. They are the only pair of light blue straight legs I have.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pair of Levi’s
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of Levi’s. I weigh 115lb and am 5’ ft tall. I got a size 27R but will be exchanging for a 26R. They feel loose around my waist just a tad bit. I know the 26R will be just right 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: genesis

customer_reviews.title: Runs small so order a size bigger....
customer_reviews.text: These were cute but didn't fit nearly as well as the LEVI Signature jeans I bought. Cute and great color but preferred the Signature with the stretch and better price too. I'm 5'3 and 145 pounds. I usually wear a size 2 or 4. Ordered larger (6) on these but still small. Ordered 4 on LEVI Signature Jean and fit well...actually a little big but they have stretch so are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ladybau

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite pair of jeans. I have a really hard time finding jeans that don't itch me. My skin is super sensitive. I break out when they add too much stretch or when it's just cheap material. No problem with these. No bad oder. Super comfortable. Great to wear with boots or flats. Already ordered more. Also got my friend one and she calles them her dating jeans lol. They do make a nice butt
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Looser fit than past 711 jeans I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little frustrated that the fit varies from other Levi’s 711 jeans I’ve bought in the past. I am plus size but do not have wide hips. This pair is a little baggy and unflattering because it has saddlebag room that I don’t need. They’re also not very skinny-legged compared to other pairs of 711 jeans. They won’t work as well inside of riding boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lvs2Cook

product_meta.title: Levi's Women's 711 Skinny Jeans
product_meta.description: Your-go to skinny jean. Designed to flatter, hold and lift. Cut with a figure-hugging fit for a chic silhouette. Levi's Sculpt with Hypersoft is super-soft for enhanced comfort with supportive stretch.
feature_bullets: Zip fly with button closure closure
Wash And Dry Inside Out With Like Colors; Liquid Detergent Is Recommended
Midrise skinny jean made with 4-way stretch denim
